description:
Sweat-inducing ascents, steep descents – always protected: they developed the col becchei shorts for men especially for demanding ski tours in alpine terrain.

In order to make these ski touring shorts particularly lightweight, robust and elastic, we use merino naturetec light as the main material: it provides excellent breathability and elasticity yet is still wind-resistant. In the front, technical inserts made of a special three-layer warp knit material with a windproof membrane protect against the weather yet remain breathable. And air pockets in the fabric provide lightweight insulation. For the sake of the environment, the shorts are pfc-free and climate-neutral.

The shorts’ details have been tailored to ski touring: for example, a dermizax®nx membrane has been used to make the back completely wind- and waterproof. The width-adjustable waistband with drawstring offers easy alterability, and its soft, merino-mix inserts provide increased comfort. Full-length side zippers allow the shorts to be quickly put on and taken off.

The col becchei shorts for men are the ideal ski touring companion, even in demanding conditions.
name: Ortovox Col Becchei WB Shorts - Mens
